about_the_game:
PowerDirector 21 Ultimate

Empower yourself with professional editing tools, features, and high-end performance capabilities to take complete control of the video production process and workflow, without the steep learning curve.

    New! AI Object Detection With Video Effects

    Automatically apply masks around people or objects to remove backgrounds, unwanted objects, or add effects.


    New! AI Motion Tracking

    Create text and VFX that smoothly follow the motion of objects or even the camera itself.


    New! GIF Maker

    Easily create and share viral animated GIFs.


    New! Video Intro Designer

    Discover and create attention-grabbing video intros alongside our community of creatives.


    New! NVIDIA Broadcast Support

    Experience state-of-the-art AI capabilities designed to enhance audio and video quality.


    New! In/Out Animations

    Bring dynamic energy to your footage with a vast collection of animations for PiP objects.


    Enhanced! AI Sky Replacement

    Enhance or totally replace the sky for perfect scenic shots. Select from a range of presets or import custom images.


    Enhanced! Mask & Blend

    Layer, shape, and blend like never before with enhanced keyframe controls.


    Enhanced! Cinematic Effects

    Enhance your shots with particles, transitions, and other visual effects.
detailed_description:
PowerDirector 21 Ultimate

Empower yourself with professional editing tools, features, and high-end performance capabilities to take complete control of the video production process and workflow, without the steep learning curve.

    New! AI Object Detection With Video Effects

    Automatically apply masks around people or objects to remove backgrounds, unwanted objects, or add effects.


    New! AI Motion Tracking

    Create text and VFX that smoothly follow the motion of objects or even the camera itself.


    New! GIF Maker

    Easily create and share viral animated GIFs.


    New! Video Intro Designer

    Discover and create attention-grabbing video intros alongside our community of creatives.


    New! NVIDIA Broadcast Support

    Experience state-of-the-art AI capabilities designed to enhance audio and video quality.


    New! In/Out Animations

    Bring dynamic energy to your footage with a vast collection of animations for PiP objects.


    Enhanced! AI Sky Replacement

    Enhance or totally replace the sky for perfect scenic shots. Select from a range of presets or import custom images.


    Enhanced! Mask & Blend

    Layer, shape, and blend like never before with enhanced keyframe controls.


    Enhanced! Cinematic Effects

    Enhance your shots with particles, transitions, and other visual effects.

name: CyberLink PowerDirector 21 Ultimate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 11, 10, 8/8.1, 7 (64 bit OS only).
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i-series and above. Haswell (4th generation) processor: Core i7-4770 (only Core and Xeon branded), and above required for AI features.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB VGA VRAM or higher
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Microsoft Windows 11 or 10 required for AI features and NVIDIA Audio/Video Denoise and Room Echo Removal.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Empower yourself with professional editing tools, features, and high-end performance capabilities to take complete control of the video production process and workflow, without the steep learning curve.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
